note.p: Politician and speculator. Third son of the fifth duke of Richmond. BA, Oxford (Christ Church), 1843. MP for Chichester, 1846–85. Lord of the Treasury, 1852 and 1858–9; secretary to the Admiralty, 1866–8; first commissioner of public works, 1874–6.
ODNB s.v. Lennox, Charles Gordon-, fifth duke of Richmond and fifth duke of Lennox.
